darkhistory.electrons.positronium¶

Positronium annihilation functions.

Functions

ortho_photon_spec(eng) Returns the photon spectrum from orthopositronium annihilation.
para_photon_spec(eng) Returns the photon spectrum from parapositronium annihilation.
weighted_photon_spec(eng) Returns the weighted photon spectrum from positronium annihilation.
